title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 105.1 - General requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 105.1 - General requirements

State Regulations
(a) Certification is limited to only those varieties which are approved by the

College of Agriculture Seed Committee and the certifying agency. (b) Each applicant will be required to
furnish information as to the source of his seed stock and to furnish a
reasonable and satisfactory guaranty as to its identity. Stock seed for the
production of certified seed must be hot water treated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
105.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
